persona.name: Harper
persona.bio: Harper, a 28-year-old full-time crypto trader, channels their competitive spirit and aggressive approach into navigating the volatile world of digital currencies. As a novice in the field, Harper thrives on the thrill of high-risk, high-reward trading, keenly learning from every market swing and eager to make a mark in the rapidly evolving crypto landscape. Their relentless drive and bold strategies set them apart as they continuously seek to outpace the competition.
